about.title: About
about.content: This tool has been designed to facilitate the calculation of carbohydrates for meals. However, the information used for the calculation of carbohydrates comes from different sources and all the data and information found in the tool can therefore only be used as a reference. No guarantee of accuracy is given for anyone wishing to use this tool.

calculator.title: Basic Glucids Calculator
calculator.notice: This calculator is provided for informational purposes only. Please be sure to double check the calculations. No guarantee of accuracy is offered.
